item.title: Mob Programming
item.description: You know pair programming? Mob programming is similar to pair programming with the whole team.

item.title: Virtual Offices
item.description: Work remotely, side-by-side. With virtual offices your distributed teams work together in an online workplace.

item.title: Video Conferencing
item.description: Video conferencing is a fundamental technology to get in touch in a remote setting. The combination of voice, video, chat, and screen sharing brings teams close together even if there are huge physical distances in between.

item.title: Virtual Coffee Breaks
item.description: Breaks are important. Taking breaks together with colleagues is also important. What usually just happens in normal office routine needs some coordination and tools in a remote work situation.
